title: Composers Concordance MultiBand Festival: Bands of Gypsies
desc: On December 6th at 3:30pm at St. Mark's Church in the Bowery,  Composers Concordance  presents the third concert of its fifth annual festival, entitled 'MultiBand.' A bevy of guitarists and composers will take over the St. Mark's Church space, to present a performance focusing on the guitar in its various aspects. The program, entitled 'Bands of Gypsies,' draws its influence from the epic  Jimi Hendrix  album recorded at the Fillmore East in 1970. Performers: Skolnick Getter Arnold Guitar Trio; SoldierKane; Anderson / Fader Duo; My Guitar?Wants To Kill Your Mama Guitar Quartet; Swarmius; Greg Baker, Andrew McKenna Lee, Sean Satin, Nadav Lev, & Gene Pritsker guitars. Composers: Bruce Arnold, Greg Baker, Dan Cooper, Damon Ferrante, Jane Getter, Masatora?Goya, Jimi Hendrix, Bryan Johanson, Sean Hickey, Andrew McKenna Lee, Gene Pritsker, David Saperstein, Alex Skolnick, David Soldier, Joseph Waters.
